name: Butter Coffee
description: Butter coffee is a drink consisting of brewed coffee, unsalted butter, and medium-chain triglycerides (MCTs), an easily digested type of fat.
directions: Freshly brew the coffee and add to blender.
Add the coconut oil and butter.
Blend for 20–30 seconds until it resembles a foamy latte.
Optionally sprinkle some cinnamon on top.
